message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with a machine learning problem of choosing the best combination of arms out of a set of options, which falls under the category of reinforcement learning. The paper proposes a novel algorithm for this problem, which suggests that it belongs to the sub-category of machine learning, i.e., cs.LG. Additionally, the paper deals with the exploration-exploitation tradeoff, which is a common problem in artificial intelligence, making cs.AI another likely sub-category. The algorithm proposed in the paper is based on divide-and-conquer, which is a common technique in data structures and algorithms, making cs.DS a likely sub-category. The paper also deals with the regret bounds of the proposed algorithm, which is a common topic in optimization and decision making, making cs.DM a likely sub-category. Finally, the paper deals with the performance evaluation of the proposed algorithm, which involves simulations and experiments, making cs.SY a likely sub-category.
